parsing_result:
## Accessories from Fujifilm

The following optional accessories are available from Fujifilm. For the latest information on the accessories available in your region, check with your local Fujifilm representative or visit https://fujifilm-x.com/accessories/.

### Rechargeable Li-ion batteries
**NP-W126S:** Additional high-capacity NP-W126S rechargeable batteries can be purchased as required.

### Battery chargers
**BC-W126S:** Replacement battery chargers can be purchased as required. At +20°C/+68°F, the BC-W126S charges an NP-W126S in about 150 minutes.

### DC couplers
**CP-W126:** For extended shooting or playback or when using the camera with a computer, use the CP-W126 to connect the camera to the AC-9V power adapter.

### AC power adapters
**AC-9V (requires CP-W126 DC coupler):** Use this 100–240V, 50/60 Hz AC power adapter for extended shooting and playback or when copying pictures to a computer.

### Remote releases
**RR-100:** Use to reduce camera shake or keep the shutter open during a time exposure (ø2.5 mm).

### Stereo microphones
**MIC-ST1:** An external microphone for movie recording.
